title: On Sridevi's First Death Anniversary, Janhvi Kapoor Remembers Mother With A Heart-Touching Picture
description: Remembering her mother Sridevi on first death anniversary, Janhvi Kapoor, who made her debut in the world of films last year, posted a heartwarming picture. Last year, the entire nation mourned the tragic and shocking demise of Sridevi.
